casebody.data:
2002-0300 (La. 10/25/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Kirk MARTINEAU. No. 2002-K-0300. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Martineau, Kirk; — Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of St. Tammany, 22nd Judicial District Court Div. B, No. 283300-1; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2000 KA 2520.

Denied.
